BIO

I am currently an undergraduate student, I developed my love for coding in my fourth year, I always know I love being behind the computers but I don't know for what reason. I learnt to code from different Platforms like the Khan Academy, Freecodecamp, frontmentor and most of my learning is on Youtube.
